action.action-desc: Mr. Vasquez (for himself and Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to reduce the distance required for the Secretary of Defense to reimburse travel expenses relating to specialty care, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the TRICARE Travel Improvement Act.

section.header: Reimbursement by the Secretary of Defense for travel expenses relating to specialty care
section.text: Section 1074i of title 10, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking In any case and inserting Except as provided in subsection (b), in any case; and
by striking 100 miles and inserting 50 miles; and
by striking the heading and inserting Special rules for exceptional circumstances and military retirees and dependents.—;
by striking The Secretary of Defense and inserting (1) The Secretary of Defense; and
by inserting after paragraph (1), as designated by subparagraph (B) of this paragraph, the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: With respect to military retirees and their dependents, the Secretary shall administer subsection (a) by substituting 50 miles for 100 miles.
